sentences.en: 'Why , I ain't sich an infernal lubber, after all.
sentences.cn: 他叫道, “ 说到底, 我也不是傻瓜蛋.

sentences.en: " Could you talk about your impressive covert role in Infernal Affairs? "
sentences.cn: “ 你能谈一下你对这个角色在阴险情节中印象 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: As a result, the infernal circle finally lead to articular cartilage cataplasia.
sentences.cn: 以至形成恶性循环, 最终导致关节软骨退变.
不要发出那种讨厌的闹声!

sentences.en: Don't say a syllable about the Infernal Twoness.
sentences.cn: 千万别谈地狱的二元论.

sentences.en: I wish the children would stop that infernal noise.
sentences.cn: 我真希望孩子们别再那么吵闹了。

sentences.en: It is she who has come to the infernal orgy.
sentences.cn: 就是她来参加这阴间的狂欢了.

sentences.en: It's an infernal mischance; I've done my best to discourage it.
sentences.cn: 这真是倒楣透顶的事; 我尽量地泼冷水.

sentences.en: Of or relating to the god Pluto or the underworld; infernal.
sentences.cn: 普路托的,阴间的:普路托的或阴间的;与之有关的; 阴森的.

sentences.en: People still have a general fear for the imaginary infernal powers.
sentences.cn: 人们对于虚构的地狱中的鬼神仍具有一种普遍的恐惧.

sentences.en: Put in something about the Supernal Oneness . Don't say a syllable about the Infernal Twoness.
sentences.cn: 说一点天上的一元论,千万别谈地狱的二元论.

sentences.en: The post office is shut, which is an infernal bore.
They can't work in these infernal conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们不能在这样糟糕透顶的条件下工作。

sentences.en: True or untrue, don't give ear to those infernal tales.
sentences.cn: 不管是否真实, 不要去听那些地狱般的故事.

sentences.en: You infernal scoundrel, how dare you tell me that?
sentences.cn: 你这个无法无天的流氓,好大胆子, 竟敢跟我说这种话.

trans.tran_cn: 地狱的，阴间的，地狱似的，<口>可恨的
